verbose_text: p-Smad3 protein then interacts with Smad4 to form a complex and translocates to the cell nucleus, where it functions as a transcriptional factor and induces the transcriptional activation of numerous fibrotic genes, including alpha-SMA, MMP-2 and collagens.
evidence: p-Smad3 protein then interacts with Smad4 to form a complex and translocates to the cell nucleus
